thread.title: Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His
thread.title_full: Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His

title: Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below 
Salman Khan has been bombarded with questions about Aishwarya Rai Bachchan everywhere, be it at the Bigg Boss new season launch or Prem Ratan Dhan Payo launch.With Aishwarya making a comeback to Bollywood, the actor sure is getting a lot of questions pertaining to her. While he very nicely avoided answering about Jazbaa promotions on Bigg Boss, he openly spoke about Aishwarya's movie poster at the trailer launch.Now before you get excited about what Salman said about Jazbaa movie poster, let me clarify that he wasn't talking about Jazbaa, but about Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam , the movie that duo starred together in.He said, "That ('Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam') was a nice poster. Really nice poster...This one ('Prem Ratan Dhan Payo') also beautiful...pretty." Unseen Romantic Pics Of Ex-Lovebirds Salman Khan-Aishwarya Rai Bachchan 
The poster of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo featuring Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor has triggered comparisons with Sanjay Leela Bhansali film Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam that featured Salman and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.Well, the actor himself has revealed, that if the posters were compared then he finds his 1999 Bollywood romantic drama film Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam better.Well, Salman Khan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's romantic chemistry was one of the best and will always be. Why don't we check out some pictures of them together... Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 1/11 PRDP Poster 
This is the first poster of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo featuring Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 2/11 Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam 
This was the movie poster of Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam starring Salman, Aishwarya and Ajay Devgn. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 3/11 Romance 
This is the romantic pose of Salman and Aish that is getting compared with the PRDP poster. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 4/11 
Another poster of Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam with Salman and Aishwarya. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 5/11 
Salman and Aishwarya in a photoshoot for the movie's poster. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 6/11 
An iconic scene from Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam that is reminisced even today. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 7/11 
Behind the scene picture of Salman Khan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 8/11 Aww 
A romantic picture of Salman Khan and Aishwarya Rai from their movie Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 9/11 
Salman and Aishwarya's romantic pose from their movie. Salman Khan Likes Aishwarya Rai's Movie Poster Better Than His 10/11
